ModMetaData.name: More Exotic Ammo
ModMetaData.author: Obscene Chicken
ModMetaData.description:
Adds additional exotic ammo types for Combat Extended guns. Inspired by CE 40mm HEDP by Calvinhood.
Currently includes: - 12 Gauge - Dragon's Breath: Low damage/penetration, but ignites the target. Frag-12: High damage/low pen medium AoE. Danger close. HEAT: High damage/pen small AoE. Explosive Shot: Torgue makes things expload. End of sales pitch. Sabot Slugs: Higher pen without blowing yourself up.
